# cmccloudv2_devops_project (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get devops project by id
data "cmccloudv2_devops_project" "project_1" {  
    devops_project_id = "07d7eb8f-62ae-4751-968a-3955ef0a6974"
}

# get devops project by name
data "cmccloudv2_devops_project" "project_1" {  
    name = "project-dev"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `type` (String) type of devops project, owner or share

### Optional

- `description` (String) search by description
- `devops_project_id` (Number) Id of the devops project
- `name` (String) search by name, match exactly

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Created at of the devops project
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
